An apology

english
saarbruecken
2021
Author

Pratik Bhandari

Published

April 2, 2021

The horrible things spoken and done
Hurt
Me,
Filled with pain and sorrow –
Every walking, living shadow
Is scary
These days
I see your tears in their dark eyes
I hear you cry in their breath
Do you see me cry?
Do you hear my tears roll down?

Intolerable guilt,
The burden of regret too heavy to carry
Is crushing me
Breaking me into pieces
with some fragments of you in it.

Oh Enough.

To let me live
To set me free
and break the chain
I come to you
And declare in silence –
I am sorry.
…I guess

  • © Pratik Bhandari
